spoilers.title: What are the guarantees?
spoilers.content: After the delivery of the project, I undertake to correct the mistakes made during the development within 1 week.

spoilers.title: What about the deadlines?
spoilers.content: I do the work within the agreed time frame.

spoilers.title: How and when is the payment made?
spoilers.content: I work on a prepayment of 30% of the order amount.

spoilers.title: When does work start?
spoilers.content: After clarifying all the details of the project and receiving an advance payment.

spoilers.title: What is the quality of my work?
spoilers.content:
The best!

I try to test each work thoroughly.

Your site will be valid, responsive, accessible, cross-browser, semantic.

spoilers.title: Forgot to specify something in the TR?
spoilers.content: What was not specified in the TR, as well as edits (except for mistakes made by me), I do for a fee.

spoilers.title: Do you have a PC-only layout?
spoilers.content: In this case, I will develop a responsive design for mobile devices based on the layout for PC for free.

spoilers.title: Consultation?
spoilers.content: I give advice on ease of use.

spoilers.title: Old browsers?
spoilers.content: I don't support older browsers, as well as Internet Explorer.
